Detailed Description

Packet for asking for roads to place traffic on.

Differs from coverdIDs and coord requests as we always look for SSIs suitable for traffic.

After the normal header the request packet contains: {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Destription \ REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & latitude \ +4 & 4 bytes & longitude \ +8 & 4 bytes & maxRadius \ +16 & 2 bytes & angle \ +18 & 1 byte & nbrOfHits \ +20 & 1 byte & maxRoadClass \ +24 & ? bytes & roadName \ {tabular}
